title: CEO of election software firm held on ID info theft charges
dc:creator: Northwest Asian Weekly
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — The founder and CEO of a software company targeted by election deniers was arrested on Oct. 11 on suspicion of stealing data on hundreds of Los Angeles County poll workers. Konnech Corporation’s Eugene Yu, 51, was arrested in Meridian Township in Michigan and held on suspicion of theft of personal identifying […]
